muscleware_platform.overview: MuscleWare is the official contest software and registration platform for NPC, NPC Worldwide, IFBB Professional League, and Canadian Physique Alliance.
muscleware_platform.key_principle: Athletes DO NOT register directly on MuscleWare.com. Instead, each event promoter has a dedicated event website where registration occurs. MuscleWare powers the backend.

common_questions.question: Do I need an NPC membership to compete?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you must have a valid NPC Member Number to register for any NPC competition. Visit npcnewsonline.com to purchase membership if you don't have one.

common_questions.question: Can I compete in multiple divisions?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you can compete in up to 8 divisions per registration. However, Women's Fit Model competitors cannot cross over to other divisions.

common_questions.question: How do I buy spectator tickets?
common_questions.answer: Spectator tickets are available through TicketSpice. Visit the event-specific URL (e.g., ticketspice.com/metroflex-ronnie-coleman-2026). Competitor registration is separate through MuscleWare. Competitors receive 2 complimentary spectator passes.

common_questions.question: How can I become a vendor at MetroFlex Events?
common_questions.answer: Email brian@metroflexgym.com with 'Vendor Booth Inquiry' in the subject line. We offer Standard ($500), Premium ($1,200), and Title Sponsor ($3,500) booth packages. Multi-event discounts available.

common_questions.question: Is MetroFlex Apparel available now?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Apparel launches February 15, 2026 at metroflexapparel.com. Products will also be available at MetroFlex Arlington front desk and at all event championships. We offer tees, tanks, hoodies, shorts, hats, gym bags, and training gear.

common_questions.question: When does MetroFlex Miami open?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Miami HQ is scheduled to open June 1, 2026. Founder's Lifetime Memberships ($2,500) are limited to first 100 members and go on sale March 1, 2026. This is a one-time payment for lifetime access with no recurring fees.

common_questions.question: How can I open a MetroFlex gym in my city?
common_questions.answer: MetroFlex Licensing Program launches March 1, 2026. We offer New Build License ($60,000) and Rebrand License ($40,000) packages. Visit metroflexlicensing.com to apply. Requirements include $150,000 liquid capital, industry experience, and suitable location.

common_questions.question: What's the difference between Novice and True Novice?
common_questions.answer: True Novice means you have never competed before in any division. Novice means you haven't won an overall or class in that specific division.

common_questions.question: When should I upload my posing music?
common_questions.answer: Upload music to your Athlete Profile page (link in confirmation email) typically 48-72 hours before the event. MP3 format only.

common_questions.question: What if I need to change my class after registration?
common_questions.answer: Contact the event promoter directly through the contact information provided in your confirmation email.

common_questions.question: How does Classic Physique weight limits work?
common_questions.answer: Classic Physique uses a height-to-weight ratio formula. Your maximum allowable weight is determined by your height. Check the official NPC rules for specific weight caps per height.

common_questions.question: What payment methods are accepted for competitor registration?
common_questions.answer: Payment methods vary by promoter and typically include PayPal, Stripe, Square, Razorpay, Yoco, or FirstData. Funds flow directly to the event promoter.

common_questions.question: Will I receive a confirmation?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you'll receive a professional confirmation email containing registration details, your Athlete Profile link, music upload instructions, and event-specific information.

common_questions.question: Can I register on the day of the show?
common_questions.answer: Some events allow day-of-show registration at the highest pricing tier, but availability varies by promoter. Early registration is strongly recommended.

common_questions.question: Do you offer sponsorship opportunities?
common_questions.answer: Yes! We offer Title Sponsor ($10,000), Platinum ($5,000), Gold ($2,500), and Category Sponsor ($1,500) packages. Annual sponsorship across all 3 events is $20,000 (save $10,000). Contact brian@metroflexgym.com for custom packages.

common_questions.question: What apparel sizes do you carry?
common_questions.answer: Most apparel items are available in S, M, L, XL, 2XL, and 3XL. We offer an AI-powered size recommendation tool on product pages - just enter your height, weight, and preferred fit.

common_questions.question: Can I try a day pass at MetroFlex Miami before committing to membership?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Day passes are $25/day with no commitment. We also offer a 10-Pack Punch Card for $199 (save $51) with no expiration date.
